badge_template_activities.title: The Windows Customer Connection Program (WCCP) engages enterprise IT Pro customers who are excited to work directly with Windows engineering throughout the planning and development cycle, long before a solution or feature is released. Our customers help engineers build the right thing, the right way, as fast as possible.

b68863be-53c2-4a72-9dad-69d4b623e1d7.description: The Windows Customer Connection Program: Community Member digital badge validates an earner's desire to provide ongoing, consistent, and deep technical feedback to the Microsoft Windows Engineering Team, as well as those related engineering teams with dependencies on Windows. Earning this badge also validates the skills associated with using Microsoft Windows and additional Microsoft Solutions that, when used together, ensure deployment with efficacy and increased end-user productivity.
b68863be-53c2-4a72-9dad-69d4b623e1d7.name: Windows Customer Connection Program: Community Member 2020

f9020b10-fe53-46b4-bcd5-5e472c0e0173.name: Windows Customer Connection Program: Customer Engagement Contributor 2021

badge_template_activities.title: Windows Customer Connection Program: Customer Engagement Member 2020
Deliver two 1:many calls through the Windows Customer Connection Program.
Demonstrate ongoing engagement in the Windows Customer Connection Program online community.
